body_html:
The forever stop and make no progress problem also happens in benchmark code

The command I use to run is: python tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --model=inception3 --eval=False --batch_size=64 --data_dir=/imagenet/data --trace_file=/home/centos/trace.json --summary_verbosity=0 --ps_hosts=ec2-54-209-254-203.compute-1.amazonaws.com:2221 --worker_hosts=ec2-174-129-166-55.compute-1.amazonaws.com:2222,ec2-54-144-65-162.compute-1.amazonaws.com:2222,ec2-54-209-254-203.compute-1.amazonaws.com:2222,ec2-54-161-80-220.compute-1.amazonaws.com:2222 --job_name=worker --task_index=0

and change the job_name and task_index correspondingly. But it stucks.....also....at 80 step of each machine, again no error messages..
